Gay Talese, the last titan of the American press
subhead: He was a pioneer of New Journalism, a movement that transformed American journalism with a literary writing style. At 93, the author of the landmark 1966 profile 'Frank Sinatra Has a Cold,' finds his daily life increasingly constrained by old age.

Tel Aviv's Tarbutat café serves as a fragile haven for Israel's progressive camp
subhead: The café, which opened two months after the October 7 attacks, is one of the few places in the country where it is still possible to discuss the reality of the war in Gaza. Conceived as a space shielded from political violence, it has nonetheless become a frequent target of far-right activists.

title: Louvre heist: All suspected members of the commando group now charged
subhead: A man suspected of being the fourth and final accomplice in the team that stole jewels from the Louvre in broad daylight has been placed in provisional detention. He was already known to authorities.

title: The housing crisis is fueling the far-right vote
subhead: In France, a growing share of the population is struggling to find housing. The shortage, which especially affects the working and middle classes, is generating resentment with consequences at the ballot box.

title: ChatGPT-assisted flirting: When online dating becomes a burden
subhead: Some users are turning to ChatGPT to flirt on their behalf, prioritizing efficiency over authenticity – a practice sometimes even encouraged by dating apps.

China's invisible workforce powering the platform economy
subhead: Service, delivery and mobility apps are shaping China's new economy. In a society with minimal safety nets, they promise frontline workers higher incomes, at the price of long hours and extreme physical effort.

title: Forgotten Louvre security report highlighted specific balcony used by crown jewel thieves
subhead: Le Monde has learned that a 2018 security audit explicitly identified the balcony used by the thieves as a point of vulnerability, even noting the possibility that a freight lift could be used to access it.

title: Germany's pension reform becomes a generational conflict
subhead: The plan agreed upon by coalition members is to maintain pension levels despite the aging population. But it is opposed by young conservatives, who are calling for more sweeping reforms.
